name: Emory Daniel
text: Miss Martha is awesome and always has great produce. I don't think you could find better quality for Better Price anywhere. Unfortunately Miss Martha will be closing soon so get it while you can

name: Stacey Moore
text: This place is no longer there.

name: Diana Kritinar
text: They have SO many beautiful plants, wood furniture - gliders, rocking chairs, swings, the smoked chicken was absolutely delicious, as was the berry chicken salad, they have keto options, sweets, bread, I just love this place!

name: Shaleigh Miller
text: One of the best experiences I’ve had. Amazing product variety & the people were fantastic! Definitely will be back.

name: Larry Jacobs
text: Great produce love their ribs .staff is friendly an very helpful. On the down side the man that makes the flowers sold our grave flowers sold our order to someone else he wasn’t very nice. Rick an his brother are the best.I recommend everyone shop and to support this local business.

name: Jo Larson
text: Super nice folks.  Parking was a bit crowded bit that's because the place is popular. All the produce seemed fresh.

name: Andrea Lindholm
text: I love Rick's Produce! The staff is amazing and their produce is so fresh and great and so are their plants. The tomatoes are definitely a fave for my fam!

name: Rick Slade
text: Great experience! Very nice facility! Outstanding staff! Can't wait to go back!

name: Michael R Ballard
text: Excellent choices...fresh produce...great BBQ...homemade soups are the best...garden shop and wood furniture availabl...always friendly and willing to help

name: Teresa Robinson
text: I love this place. Friendly people and great produce. Best place around.

name: Beverly Davis
text: Love Rick's!! Got some beautiful palm trees and flowers and the best ribs ever today!!

name: george williams
text:
This market is clean, well stocked, staff is knowledgeable & hospitable, fresh veggies galore & great variety of fruit as well...awesome place to score groceries 👌 Also lots of jams, jellies, honey, sauces and other goodies. Meats, casseroles & plenty of sweet tooth treats.
My wife scored a bounty of vegetables and a bunch of scupernongs & I brought home a beautiful cedar porch swing.
We will be returning anytime we are close by 😊

name: David Martin
text: Friendly folks with great products.

name: anthony givens
text: Its a pretty neat place to shop. They should encourage mask wearing till we get thru this virus thing.

name: Eric Malone
text: Great place to shop really nice layout and the customer service is great

name: Donna Patterson
text:
Ricks is awesome. Freshest of vegetables, and fruits. Love it all.
Added to say, the meats are so good. The Boston butts are a family favorite .The bologna is great. I also purchased all the flowers for graveside decoration at Ricks this year. If you have not been there! What are you waiting on? It is an awesome place to shop for fresh veggies and just about any thing you want.  Thanks Rick we could not survive without you! ❤

name: Maria Gholston
text: First time stopping by today... The staff and owner (Rick) are very hospitable and friendly.  True exame.of "Southern Hospitality". Will definitely be back.

name: Lindsey Hanna
text: Everything looked super clean and lovely, even the bathroom! The veggies looked amazing and the section of jams and pickles was great.

name: Big Hand Dave
text: Great produce!!!  Someone is always ready to help however needed and i am always greeted with smiles.

name: Reagan Boyles
text: Lots of inventory, good prices, staff is helpful and friendly. Flowers, pumpkins, mums, cornhole game boards, lots of good stuff here.

name: Phillip James
text: Great. Smoked meats and good variety of other things.

name: jake and bake
text: We loved the chairs they had. Very friendly people. A little high on the produce but they have some beautiful produce.

name: Bootsie Lewis
text: I have been a customer of Ricks Produce since they opened years ago! Truly love the fresh fruit, peaches, can't get enough of them. If you haven't tried some of the jams, hot sauces or the salsa you should!!

name: Roger Coats
text: Good variety of different items

name: Amberia Spiller
text: Best place to get fresh fruits and vegetables. The smoked meats taste amazing. The staff are friendly and extremely helpful.

name: Tyler Oliver
text: Great selection of produce as well as other food products (bacon, sausage, hamburger meat). Try the Mama Cole's fried pies! Great customer service as well.

name: Summer Trapp
text: Always love the fresh quality vegetable from Rick's each year. Today was my first stop of the season and I was thrilled to find that they now carry all my fave Dutch Oven goodies.

name: Guitardude4hire
text: Very pleased with my visit. Freindly helpful staff. Fair prices.. I'll definitely be back..

name: Sheri Eagerton
text: It was great  the meals  are very  good.

name: Jenn Adams
text: Always amazing service and product!  Tons of great fall decor and pumpkins!

name: Michael Geib
text: Great fresh fruits and veggies

name: David Rhodes
text: Top notch friendliness from all the their employees. They have a great selection of produce, unique and delicious desserts, and all kinds of nice things. Stop by and check it out.

name: Diane Faust
text: The freshest fruit and vegetables you will find...straight out of the garden....don't forget the ribs...fresh smoked meat also...😁

name: A N Bar
text: Tons of produce and homemade breads and candy! Great place to shop

name: ML Howell
text: Beautiful plants and flowers

name: Nina Coats
text: Easy to find things. Friendly service.

name: chelsie keeton
text: Always my favorite place to get my produce! Lots of great local produce and products sold here!

name: Laurie Nave
text: Great selection, fair prices, local honey, friendly owners

name: Kathy Baggett
text: Great vegetables, great selection and very friendly staff.  We love Rick’s!

name: Jerry Brackin
text: The ribs awesome the white sauce we loved it better than a restaurant wow we will be back

name: Kathy Baggett
text: Great vegetables, great selection and very friendly staff.  We love Rick’s!

name: Jerry Brackin
text: The ribs awesome the white sauce we loved it better than a restaurant wow we will be back

name: Brenda Lindsey
text: This place is awesome!  Ribs and Boston butt are delicious 👌😋

name: Jennifer Watson
text: Roasted corn was delicious! The orange lemonade was light and refreshing!

name: KT PHOTOS
text: I'm from out of state and a lady suggested to come here. So I drove 45 min for rude and u professional service. Never again ill spend my money else where.

name: Owens8
text: People NOT social distancing. Employees not wearing masks or gloves. Customers bringing dogs inside! Overpriced for grocery store produce. Take your hard earned money to Publix

name: Matt Posey
text: Nice place...little pricey...but otherwise good stuff

name: Anita Parker
text: great place, I am excited to try new items in salads

name: BigBen 076
text: Rick’s Produce is the place to go in the shoals! Great produce, meats, flowers and more with a  friendly staff. Support local businesses!!!!

name: Kala Mccaig
text: Always great service there. Prices are comparable to local markets.

name: Linda Crews
text: Nice

name: Tracy Robinson
text: Great place..ilove it!

name: Sherry Lockhart
text: Great produce... wonderful strawberries!!

name: Dorothy Anglin
text: Ricks is the best and friendly

name: Christie Garner
text: Rocks is amazing! Never buy produce in the spring and summer anywhere else! The most fresh fruits and vegetables anywhere!And they are so very helpful

name: gregory tenpas
text: A must to shop and visit. Fresh fruits and vegetables. Outdoor furniture and plants. Great staff , reasonable pricing.

name: Jennifer Dolehite
text: Corner of the road produce, jams, pumpkins, Indian corn, wooden chairs, refrigerated goods and more.  Totally stocked and expanding every time we visit.  Fair pricing.  Good people.

name: Bryant Mauldin
text: Wonderful place with a great staff. Make you feel at home. While carrying some of the Best available Products in the SHOALS

name: Eric Robert
text: Pricey

name: Tim Palmer
text: Great selection and customer service!

name: Dennis Phillips
text: Great produce and friendly staff

name: Amy Allen
text: Always great product and great people.  Highly reccomend.

name: Linda Smothermon
text: Great produce. Knew the strawberries were fresh because I could smell them when I walked up.

name: Edgar Ferrell
text: Everyone treats you like family....

name: Melinda Wynn
text: Love It!  Great produce early in the year. Great tomatoes!

name: Robin Featherston
text: Loved the variety but it's a little pricey. I still bought some good home grown veggies tho!

name: William Lux
text: This is our go-to place for vegetables locally. Rick and his crew are knowledgeable and great to deal with.

name: Wanda Sherer
text: This is the best produce stand around.  The people are wonderful and the produce is delicious.

name: Mike Gean
text: It is the best place to buy produce Rick is a really good person that knows his produce very well and an honest man

name: Lynn Brewer
text: Good veggies but overcharges. Takes items off the scales before it shows correct weight. I weighed items at home and was overcharged approximately $1.

name: Susan Jones
text: I love going to Rick's produce they are always so helpful and knowledgeable!

name: Brad McGuire
text: Awesome fruit and vegetables! Best flavor and prices in NW Alabama!

name: Wanda Sherer
text: This is the best produce stand around.  The people are wonderful and the produce is delicious.

name: mya kissinger
text: Love all the variety they have. Will be back again soon .

name: Paula Jo Scott King
text: Lots of good fresh produce also alot of hand crafted furniture and goods.

name: Nathan Graham
text: They had a lot of items that aren't available other places. Prices were fair and great variety to select from.

name: Tracy Biggers
text: They are always so helpful and friendly. The flowers and produce are always fresh.

name: Dustin Coan
text: This is only a seasonal place but they have great produce! Check the Facebook page as they also carry a lot of other cool farm to table related things!

name: Dendy Lester
text: Drove all the way from Petersvile to those great tomatoes Cherokee  purple love going to ricks

name: Scott Mason
text: Great Local Business To Get Your Fresh Fruits , Vegetables And Garden Plants !

name: Tonya Hawkins
text: Delicious produce , great price, and friendly service.

name: Frede Frazier
text: The produce is amazing. People there are super nice.

name: Cindy Gamble
text: Love Rick's, best place around. So much to choose from.

name: Justin Proctor
text: Amazing selection of fresh fruits and vegetables, with the amazing staff!

name: Sonya White
text: Nice place but prices are a little steep!

name: brandon tolbert
text: The best place to buy fresh vegs and fruits, and the staff is great!!!!

name: Mike Diggs
text: They have anything you want and it's fresh!

name: Crystal Lovell
text: The very best place to get all veggies, flowers etc. Every one there is so sweet kind and very helpful. If you haven't been it's a must go.

name: Christine McClantoc
text: Good variety but expensive

name: Jason Pace
text: Great veggies & fruit good prices too

name: Lee Mcdonald
text: They always have the freshest produce in town.

name: Susan Arlene Moore
text: Nice fresh peoduce

name: marcus newsome
text: Love this place

name: David Waldrep
text: Very nice will be going back

name: Mary Stanfield (Darla Starr)
text: Good produce and very friendly people

name: Louise Hester
text: Friendly.  Great produce.

name: Darla Letsinger
text: Everybody was out of pumpkins Walmart close last day the day of Halloween so I stopped by Rick's not only did you have a bunch but because it was the last day I were a dollar piece I was so satisfied with the service and a product and of course especially the price but I found a place to come for all my produce!!

name: Kassondra Baylis
text: Fresh and amazing prices

name: Jerry Wilson
text: Carried my large water melon to the end of the lot for us...

name: Jacqueline Carter
text: Love it best place to get fresh produce

name: patrick binkley
text: Prices are high

name: Donna Robbins
text: Best in area

name: Sharon Cole
text: Love it!!!

name: regina hanback
text: Best produce and prices

name: Steven Poole
text: Stop by and support our local businesses!!!!!

name: Susan Harville
text: Excellent.....

name: Amber McGaughy
text: Super nice people

name: Kim Aday
text: Love the place

name: Craig Baldwin
text: The best peaches!

name: Mike Taylor
text: Great Place  !

name: Eli Dunstan
text: Very friendly and good selection

name: J. Michael Campbell
text: nice selection, nice people

name: Leigh Frederick
text: Awesome produce and great prices

name: Driven 2nsanity
text: Best produce around.

name: Jerry Richardson
text: Nice folks.

name: Carolyn Hairrell
text: Friendly people, great fresh produce.

name: Dusty McCain
text: Awesome selection of produce and canned goods.

name: connie diggs
text: Great selection and very helpful associates!

name: Dana McGuire
text: Always great produce and personal service.

name: Derek South
text: Good selection.

name: Bonnie Daily
text: Great produce,  staff, and prices!

name: Sherry Roberts
text: Rick and Kevin are special guy we are blessed to have them in our little town and all the rest of those sweet folks bless you all
